name: Fake World (itch)
description:
Hello, Subject 42. Are you ready to begin tests for our world? You will be going from one room to another and WE will need you to report anything unusual that you may find on your path. Some things may not work, and some things are there for a reason. Stay alive and don't forget to report.

Gameplay

Experience bugs and glitches of the newly created world that you need to pass in order to complete your existence.  You will use some glitches to go to the next level or avoid them and some are there to annoy you.

Controls
  • WASD for movement 
  • Mouse to look around
  • Space for Jumping
  • Left-click to pick an object
Credits

Project Leader: Tomislav Marković

Programer: Andrej Lukić

Level Designer: Klaudija Kaurin

Mentor: Dominik Cvetkovski
